description:
Worldview in missions is a course designed for people interested in working in missions cross-culturally. The course will utilize video, graphics, and downloadable training materials to help the students walk through an introduction to Christian Worldview. All professors have extensive overseas cross-cultural missions experience. Professors desire and are willing to interact with students.

This course is approximately one hour long. All lectures are video and graphics based divided into 10 short lectures. Videos are all downloadable and available for your use. We encourage you to watch all 10 lectures in order, but you may do so at your own convienience and pace. You may also pick whatever lectures you feel are most relevant.

This course will really help you understand different worldviews in order to more effectively communicate the gospel in a way that the listener truly understands. Our desire is to see truly transformed lives based on a complete understanding of the gospel
title: Worldview in Missions
instructors: David Olson, Don Barger, Dr. Terry Lassiter, Arnold Austin, Brent Waldrep, Donald Crawford
